title: Drawing, "Oval Table", ca. 1932
medium: Graphite and black ink on tracing paper
markings: Stamp in black ink, lower center: DONALD DESKEY/145 WEST 57TH STREET/NEW YORK CITY
inscribed: Inscribed in graphite in stamp, lower center: 662/F.S./1662, S., 5/4, 1, A.T.B.; inscribed in red color pencil on verso, lower center: # 50; dimensions, instructions in graphite
description: Perspective and plans for oval table. Surface of table in dark material, probably Bakelite. Four straight, squared legs that become semi-circular stretcher/base on floor; legs connected at base.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Oval Table", ca. 1932.
ca. 1932. Graphite and black ink on tracing paper. Gift of Donald Deskey. 1975-11-651.
